107501.name: Tigacti
107501.description: Tigacti is a geography game in which the players have to locate places on a world map. The active player draws a card which contains a location (like the Giseh Sphinx, for instance) and then places a transparent round disc on the world map, centering it where s/he believe the thing is located. Then an semi-circular marker is placed around the disk to show where it was placed and the disk is removed. The card is now turned around and reveals which quadrant of the board it belongs to. The quadrants are card-sized, and the cards show a cross with the precise location. Afterwards, the disc is put back on top of the cards - it contains concentric rings which mark how far the player was off. Points are scored depending on how close the player guessed the location.

107502.name: Edge Role Playing Game
107502.description:
From publisher blurb:

Where all things collide, there is the Edge. It is a force so powerful that those who master it can only hold but a splinter of its complexity. In that splinter, they can hold the world. They can hold Deomeidh.

Deomeidh is a world of true intrigue and adventure. Your character will need cunning, strength, and determination simply to survive. Use the powers of the Edge, Weave, and Faith to combat your enemies, care for your friends, and determine your destiny.

There are heroes among you... become them.

107503.name: Faded Glamour
107503.description:
From the Game Chef website:

Exiles from the Faerie Realm make a home in 30′s Hollywood and struggle with dark emotions that constrict the choices the characters can make.

107505.name: Vegas
107505.description:
Gambling game, a promotional item for Woodpecker Cider. Casino themed game in which the board provides a number of different betting options as players land on spaces. However, as well as making a bet when landing on a space, if you win you get the chance to buy the space, and act as banker for other players landing on it.

Includes a deck of playing cards with the Woodpecker symbol on the backs.

published ca 1980

107506.name: Blood, Love, and Rhetoric
107506.description:
From the Game Chef website:

A game of intrigue in the court of a Queen as capricious as she is beautiful, in which character sheets are sonnets composed during play.

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107508.name: Cardenio's Daughter, or "Follow the Lady"
107508.description:
From the Game Chef website:

One moment, Cardenio is a Duke in exile. Then, he is a college professor. Just as quickly, Cardenio is a foolish rogue. Which is the real world?

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107509.name: Taz-mania (SNES)
107509.description:
User Summary

Taz-Mania is an action title based on the Tazmanian Devil character from Looney Toons. Taz needs to head down the road collecting all the kiwis, but there are several obstacles in his way. Obstacles can be evaded by using the Tornado Spin.

107510.name: Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice Trivia Game
107510.description:
A must have for any Jane Austen fan. Based on the novel Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen, the game contains 300 trivia cards and 8 bonus Jane Austen trivia questions.

Each player/team on his turn rolls a die and is then asked the trivia question from one of the cards. If he answers correctly, he earns points equal to the number rolled on the die and then rolls again and continues his turn until he answers incorrectly, at which point it is the other players/teams turn.

The first player/team to earn 25 points wins.

107511.name: Chaucer's Daughter Lost
107511.description:
From the Game Chef website:

Time-traveling Shakespeare kidnaps Chaucer’s daughter, and as ransom, Chaucer must put down his pen. Help quest for Chaucer’s daughter.

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

rpg: The Night, the Wilderness, and the Power
107513.name: The Night, the Wilderness, and the Power
107513.description:
From the Game Chef website:

A dutiful daughter braves the night and the unknown. What will she risk, what promises will she break to gain her heart’s desire?

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107514.name: The Trouble with Rose
rpghonor: 2011 Indie RPG Award - Best Free Game - Runner-Up
107514.description:
From the Game Chef website:

A fast and light romp about exiled Rose and her friends. Players create a tale of drama, tragedy, comedy, and betrayal where everyone has a secret agenda.

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107515.name: Revenge of the Groundlings
107515.description:
From the Game Chef website:

Groundlings Unite! With the playhouses closed by plague, it’s up to you and your haphazard memories to perform Shakespeare for the masses!

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107516.name: Mission Cobra
107516.description:
User Summary

As you fly your powerful helicopter, fending off wave after wave of enemy aircraft, your only concern is to stay alive. Grab as many power-ups and fuel as you can! You will need it. The enemy boss is closing in. Beating him will reward you with a rush of excitement. But not for long. There is yet another level coming up, more enemy aircraft to kill and another boss waiting for you. Your quest is never ending. You will only rest after you die...

107517.name: The Play's The Thing (Game Chef)
rpghonor: 2012 Indie RPG Award - Most Innovative Game - Runner-Up
107517.description:
Not to be confused with the d20 product or collection of essays of the same name.

From the Game Chef website:

Groundlings Unite! With the playhouses closed by plague, it’s up to you and your haphazard memories to perform Shakespeare for the masses!

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107518.name: Castle of Deceit
107518.description:
User Summary

The Rune Stones, guarded by Phfax, wielder of Emerald magic, have been stolen by six deadly beings. It is up to you, Cebo, to enter Phfax's castle and retrieve them. Be aware of the hallucinations! Not everything you see or hear may be as it seems.

107519.name: Exiles of Will
107519.description:
From the Game Chef website:

Five minor characters from the canon seek to end their exile and find a happy ending.

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107520.name: Forsaken
107520.description:
From the Game Chef website:

A game about Exiles who seek reconciliation for broken promises in order to change their legacy at home.

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

107521.name: Bomber
107521.description:
From box cover:

An authentic simulation of allied bombing raids over Europe in WWII. Your ultimate objective will be to survive 25 missions as pilot of the fabled B-17 Flying Fortress.

You will engage in all aspects of the mission from planning through execution. Flak batteries and enemy fighters will work against you, but you've got a ten-man crew and a hell of a plane to back you up.

107522.name: Campagnes: Pacte de Cendres Manuel
107522.description:
Introduction
Vivez des aventures hors-normes à travers des myriades de mondes au milieu des luttes incessantes que se livrent les quatre Clans qui ambitionnent de dominer leurs rivaux. Parcourez des mégalopoles surpeuplées, traversez des paysages de toute beauté, retrouvez des vestiges sacrés, inspectez des stations orbitales abandonnées… Découvrez les galaxies jumelles, les milliards de systèmes qui les composent, les sept espèces intelligentes qui les peuplent et les différentes factions qui essayent d’élargir leurs sphères d’influence par tous les moyens…
Incarnez un personnage qui se retrouvera au centre des intrigues les plus palpitantes et des aventures les plus trépidantes, au sein d’une équipe d’intrépides aventuriers tous prêts à s’entraider. Apprenez à maîtriser différentes techniques pour vous sortir des situations les plus désespérées, faites appel à votre intelligence pour résoudre les dilemmes les plus inextricables, comptez sur votre réussite pour parvenir à surmonter les épreuves les plus périlleuses.
Accomplissez des prodiges, terrassez les plus redoutables adversaires, triomphez des plus incroyables péripéties mais faites le avec style, faites le dans le monde de Twin Galaxies ! L’avenir des galaxies jumelles se trouve peut-être entre vos mains…

Google Translation
Experience adventures through non-standard myriads of worlds in the midst of incessant warfare being waged by the four Clans who aim to dominate their rivals. Browse overcrowded megacities, cross the beautiful landscapes, sacred relics find, inspect the abandoned space stations ... Discover the twin galaxies, the billions of systems that make up the seven intelligent species that inhabit them and the various factions trying to expand their spheres of influence by any means ...
Play as a character who is at the center of intrigues most exciting and most exciting adventures, in a team of intrepid adventurers all ready to help each other. Learn to master various techniques to get you out of the most desperate situations, use your wits to solve the most intractable dilemmas, count on your success in achieving overcome the most dangerous events.
Complete wonders, defeat the most formidable opponents, defeat of the most incredible adventures, but do it with style, do it in the world of Twin Galaxies! The future of the twin galaxies may be found in your hands ...

107523.name: Campagnes: Fiche de Vaisseau – Risky Bizness
107523.description:
User Summary
This is a vehicle to be used in the Twin Galaxies campaign setting: Pacte de Cendres. It is accompanied by artwork for visualization of the vehicle, a Vaisseau Transporter called the CG1 Taurus.

107524.name: Campagnes: L’Équipée du Sterling
107524.description:
Introduction
Une campagne typée Space Opera à monde ouvert, se déroulant dans le Secteur de la Chimère, au sein duquel les personnages des joueurs enchaîneront moult aventures afin de prouver qu'ils méritent de disposer du Sterling Firenza, un vaisseau d'exception doté de technologies expérimentales. Une fois celui-ci récupéré, ils devront alors en faire le meilleur usage afin de mener à bien les nombreuses missions, difficiles et risquées, qui leur seront confiées.

Google Translation
This Space Opera campaign is set in the open world of the Chimera Sector, in which the player characters will engage in adventures to prove they deserve to have the Sterling Firenza, a vessel with exceptional experimental technology . Once it is recovered, they will then make the best use to carry out many tasks, difficult and risky, assigned to them.

107525.name: Site Market Game
107525.description:
The object is to accrue the most money of all the players. This is done by buying and selling RinkWorks features as their prices fluctuate. The one with the most money at the end of the game wins.
The prices of the features change almost every day. The prices are set based mostly on how many hits each site received the day before. If the site received more hits on one day than on the previous day, its price will probably go up. If it received fewer, it will probably go down. I say "probably" because prices are determined based on the features' hits with respect to the total. So if the traffic on all features increases or decreases in proportion, the prices will not be affected, but if one feature gains or loses while the others stay the same, the prices will be adjusted accordingly.
Only traffic to the main page of each feature is counted. Although most features contain many pages, the prices in the site market are only affected by hits to the main pages of each feature.

Source: The Game Website.

107526.name: Academy Awards Predictions Game
107526.description:
The Academy Awards Predictions Game consists of two separate games each year, one to predict the nominees in the top Oscar categories, and the other to predict the winners in all categories. The winner of the game is the one to have successfully predicted the most Academy Award nominees/winners.

Source: The Game Website.

107527.name: Brain Food
107527.description:
Give your mind a work out on our devious collection of puzzles. There are hundreds, ranging from word games to logic problems to riddles. Some are tricky. Some require innovation. All require thinking power.

Puzzle Types:

Logi-Numbers Puzzles
Logic Puzzles
Word Boxes Puzzles
Word Puzzles
Number Puzzles
Party Puzzles
Joke Puzzles




Source: The Game Website.

107528.name: All the World
107528.description:
From the Game Chef website:

A structured story-game for three players, inspired by the form and content of Shakespeare’s plays. Will you live a tragedy or a comedy?

Game Chef 2011 runner up.

boardgamehonor: 2011/2012 Boardgames Australia Awards Best International Game Nominee
2012 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee
2012 Golden Geek Best Abstract Game Winner
2012 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
2012 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee
2012 Vuoden Peli Adult Game of the Year Nominee
2013 Origins Awards Best Board Game Nominee
107529.description:
In Kingdom Builder, the players create their own kingdoms by skillfully building their settlements, aiming to earn the most gold at the end of the game.

Nine different kinds of terrain are on the variable game board, including locations and castles. During his turn, a player plays his terrain card and builds three settlements on three hexes of this kind. If possible, a new settlement must be built next to one of that player’s existing settlements. When building next to a location, the player may seize an extra action tile that he may use from his next turn on. These extra actions allow extraordinary actions such as moving your settlements.

By building next to a castle, the player will earn gold at the end of the game, but the most gold will be earned by meeting the conditions of the three Kingdom Builder cards; these three cards (from a total of ten in the game) specify the conditions that must be met in order to earn the much-desired gold, such as earning gold for your settlements built next to water hexes or having the majority of settlements in a sector of the board.

Each game, players will use a random set of Kingdom Builder cards (3 of 10), special actions (4 of 8), and terrain sectors to build the map (4 of 8), ensuring you won't play the same game twice!

Kingdom Builder FAQ - please read before posting questions in the forum.
